page.title: 19TOURISM IN TENBY AREA
page.content: Tourism has grown rapidly in this area during the last 180 years.Since Sir William Paxton brought his bathing machine to Tenby. The area provides for the tourists in a variety of ways.The coastline is within the National Parks Boundary,and offers some beautiful walks and sandy beaches to relax on.There are amenities in the area which cater for the tourist during the season. Tenby and surrounding areas depend very much on their natural beauty to attract the tourists to the area.The population number increases considerably during the season,it is extremely busy on the beaches and in the town and main roads leading into the area.
